snippet: Four of the top European officials rejected the idea of debt backed by the 17 euro zone members, in line with the wishes of Germany.
abstract: Four top European Union officials deliver report on the debt crisis and how best to avoid a similar catastrophe in the future, rejecting the idea that the euro zone should issue debt backed by the 17 member states; report's conclusions are largely in line with the wishes of Germany.
lead_paragraph: Four of the top European officials rejected the idea of debt backed by the 17 euro zone members, in line with the wishes of Germany.

headline.main: European Leaders Oppose Issuing Common Debt
headline.print_headline:
New Report
Opposes
Shared Debt
In Europe
